verbs.description: [ARG1: Glum] [V: is] [ARG2: a word that described the reaction on MSNBC to the North Korean summit] . With an annoyed tone , the Morning Joe hosts of Tuesday mocked the chances for success in the summit between Donald Trump and Kim Jong - un . MSNBC guest Jon Meacham even denied that the summit was “ historic . ”
